commentary: 18.28 Unsteady unsteady? Natural vulgar? Stunned unbending? cheating cheating? Unnatural: malicious? Lazy: lazy? Melancholy desponding? Long-suffering procrastinating? f and? Subject agent? Tamas: Tamasic (dark)? Ucyate is said.Commentary Owing to his vulgar nature he is not able to discriminate between proper and improper actions. His heart is filled with vanity. He will never prostrate himself before the deity
